column5: OverviewApplication Period for 2024-25 intake is 13th November 2022 – 6th June 2024. Apply Now! Starting from academic year 2023/24, the Department of Drug Sciences is introducing a master degree in Industrial Nanobiotechnologies for Pharmaceuticals (LM8 administrative class)
column7: • EU and non-EU students regularly residing in Italy: 156 - 3500 euro per year, determined by students’ family income. • Non-Eu students with a valid study VISA: flat rate, set on the basis of the Country of citizenship and the field of study. The flat rate ranges from 400 EUR to 3500 EUR per year.
